response.overview: a group of friends go on an adventurous search for “skateboardeater24”, the reason for the search being that they have a deadline to eat a skateboard in 24 hours or they lose EVERYTHING. on the search they make many enemies and almost no progress, therefore they decide to get drunk. waking up hungover they find out they have only 7 minutes to finish the skateboard, of which they haven’t even begun to eat. met also with a protest outside their house with an angry mob of individuals against skateboard eating. these people also being canonical recurring characters in the “bunch of friends” universe. this eventually turns into a massive fistfight in their garage, ending with the death of one of the main characters “shirley”. this saddens the crew deeply, so deeply in fact, that they lay on the ground weeping. only then does skateboardeater24 enter the room and slyly finishes eating the skateboard.
response.tagline: a bunch of friends attempt to eat a skateboard in 24 hours
response.title: 24 hours to eat a skateboard
